bwwExcerpt: You could describe "Something Rotten!" as "Shakespeare in Love" meets "Spamalot"...With all its showmanship and silliness, "Something Rotten!" begins on an extremely promising note, sustains it throughout act one, and then falters in act two, where attempts are made to resolve the haywire plot...Even so, "Something Rotten!" is a great deal of cartoonish fun, especially for musical theater fans who can appreciate the inside references...Its cheery songs are enjoyable and hummable...The cast is co
